name: Rotten Blood
description:
In Rotten Blood  you awake in a dark forest all by yourself. The only exit behind you is locked. You have to find your way through the forest and collect various items in order to progress, but you are not alone.

The early access version of the game features two areas: the forest and the swamp. Two more areas, as well as more puzzles and items will be added in the finished game.

Created and developed by Nico Lovell.
